onboard.before_sub: This needs to be said upfront.
onboard.before_text1: The path to a functional relationship with a resistant stepchild typically takes 7 to 12 years. The fastest documented full integration was 4 years. Some families never get there — and a stable, respectful distance is a valid outcome.
onboard.before_text2: No app will change that timeline. What this tool does is make the invisible visible — so you can see whether your efforts are producing change, even when it doesn't feel like it.
onboard.before_text3: You're not here because you failed. You're here because you care enough to track what's actually happening.
onboard.child_age_sub: At the time your family formed
onboard.loyalty_sub: Does the child seem torn between accepting you and staying loyal to their biological parent?
onboard.benchmark_intro: Based on what you've shared, research suggests:
onboard.benchmark_note: This tool won't shorten that timeline. It will make the progress within it visible — so you don't abandon what's working, and you don't burn out from effort that feels invisible.

report.closing: This isn't a complaint. It's me showing you what I'm tracking so we can be a team in this.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: Steadfast stores all data locally on your device using IndexedDB. This includes interaction logs, profile settings, progress snapshots, and any photos you attach.
privacy.p2: No data is collected, transmitted, or stored on any server.
privacy.p2_bold: We have no access to your data. There is no account, no login, no analytics, no tracking, and no cookies.
privacy.p3: No external network requests are made. The app uses only system fonts and runs entirely offline after first load.
privacy.p4: You can export your data as a JSON file at any time using the Export button above. You can erase all data using the Erase All Data option above, or by clearing your browser's site data for this app.
privacy.p5: Photos you attach are resized and stored locally as part of your entry data. They are never uploaded anywhere.
